title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 171 - Facility Programs
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 171 - Facility Programs

State Regulations
§ 171.1 - Repealed
§ 171.2 to 171.4 - Repealed
§ 171.5 - Repealed
§ 171.6 - Repealed
§ 171.7 - Repealed
§ 171.8 - Repealed
§ 171.9 to 171.10 - Repealed
§ 171.11 - Repealed

Subpart 171-1 - Bill Of Rights For Juveniles (§ 171-1.1 to 171-1.9)

Subpart 171-2 - Resident Mail (§ 171-2.1 to 171-2.7)

Subpart 171-3 - Resident Privileged Mail (§ 171-3.1 to 171-3.6)

Subpart 171-4 - Resident Telephone Calls (§ 171-4.1 to 171-4.6)

Subpart 171-5 - Appeal (§ 171-5.1 to 171-5.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. E, pt. 171

Statutory authority: Executive Law, art. 19-G, §§
500, 501, 502, 503, 504, 518;L. 1997, ch. 436

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
